name: A Restless Soul
description:
Description:

Control a haunted gravestone and defend yourself from restless souls. This game was developed for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam. Because of several issues in development, one of the core features to transition to a new gravestone had to be removed. It is also plagued by many other problems which strangely only occur in the browser, but I still wanted to turn something in, to show how far I got.

How to play?
  • Shoot the other gravestone
  • Try not to die
Controls:

Movement - arrow keys/WASD

Shoot - Mouse 1

Rotate - Mouse

Pause Menu - P

Assets used:
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/world-materials-free...
Contributor:

Pascal Fitzner
